snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg addressed Britain’s governing Conservative Party on Wednesday, seeking to emphasize his ties to the country and to link his governing style to Britain’s milder brand of conservatism.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg addresses Britain’s governing Conservative Party, seeking to emphasize his ties to the country and to link his governing style to Britain’s milder brand of conservatism.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg addressed Britain’s governing Conservative Party on Wednesday, seeking to emphasize his ties to the country and to link his governing style to Britain’s milder brand of conservatism.

headline.seo: Bloomberg, in England, Likens Style to Britain’s Conservatives’
headline.main: Addressing Britain’s Conservative Party, Mayor Likens Its Governing Style to His
headline.print_headline: Addressing Britain’s Conservative Party, Mayor Likens Its Governing Style to His
